sentences.en: A fox darted out of the midst of the thicket.
sentences.cn: 一只狐狸从灌木丛中窜了出来.

sentences.en: A sabre slammed fearsomely through the thicket in all directions.
sentences.cn: 骑兵穿过灌木丛,从四面八方发起了猛烈而可怕的攻击.

sentences.en: A thicket makes good cover for animals to hide in.
sentences.cn: 丛林是动物的良好隐蔽处.

sentences.en: An olive-coloured tent stood within a thicket of trees.
sentences.cn: 一顶橄榄色帐篷扎在树丛当中。

sentences.en: Fat chance I can get a thicket for the concert.
sentences.cn: 我很难有机会得到音乐会的票了.

sentences.en: Just as he reached the center of the thicket the dried twigs cracked again.
sentences.cn: 刚到了树丛深处,枯枝折裂声又响起.

sentences.en: One day he was fishing with another boy when a gamekeeper suddenly darted forth from a thicket.
sentences.cn: 有一天他正和另一个男孩在那边钓鱼，突然从灌木丛里窜出一个看守。

sentences.en: Suddenly he dashed into a bamboo thicket.
sentences.cn: 这时他忽然往旁边一闪,向竹丛里跑去.

sentences.en: The Country Mouse was sitting under a hazel thicket plucking nuts.
sentences.cn: 乡鼠正坐在榛树丛下摘硬果.

sentences.en: The fox hid in the thicket where the dogs could not reach it.
sentences.cn: 狐狸躲进了狗抓不到它的灌木丛中.

sentences.en: The novel is a thicket of literary references.
sentences.cn: 这本小说纯粹是由一堆文学参考书胡乱拼凑而成。

sentences.en: They behaved like men wielding axes to cut a thicket of trees.
sentences.cn: 他们好像人扬起斧子,砍伐林中的树.

sentences.en: They showed me the hidden things silence revealed: a pheasant craning its neck to spy on us from a thicket, a crow hopping from branch to branch, a raccoon snoring in its den.
sentences.cn: 他们指给我那些原本隐藏起来、却被寂静暴露了的东西：一头野鸡从灌木丛中伸长脖子打探我们，一只乌鸦在树枝间跳来跳去，一只浣熊在窝里打鼾。

sentences.en: To try to open a foreign-owned business is to enter a thicket of regulations from which few emerge.
sentences.cn: 要开一家外资企业就要钻条条框框，没几个出来的。

sentences.en: We crawled into the thicket and hid.
sentences.cn: 我们爬进灌木丛,藏起来了.

sentences.en: We were now at the margin of the thicket.
sentences.cn: 我们现在已经来到了丛林的边缘.

words.tran_cn: 变浓；变厚；变得模糊；变粗；变复杂
使变厚；使模糊；使…变复杂

trans.tran_cn: 灌木丛，丛状物，错综复杂
trans.tran_en: a group of bushes and small trees
